original_text: He did what was evil in the sight of the Lord and walked in the way of his father, and in his sin which he made Israel to sin.
korean_text: 그가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하되 그의 아버지의 길로 행하며 그가 이스라엘에게 범하게 한 그 죄 중에 행한지라

sentences.original_text: He did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주의 보시기에 악한 일을 행했다

sentences.original_text: and walked in the way of his father
which he made Israel to sin.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘로 하여금 죄를 범하게 했다
